entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:14 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:14 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Clearing. High minus 2.
